Title: High Grade 18K Gold Haas Open Face Pocket Watch CA1920s
Description: High Grade 18K Haas Open Face Pocket Watch Swiss; Haas; Man’s; Serial# 60,922; C. 1920’s CASE: The 18K yellow gold, 45mm, plain polished open face case features a monogram. DIAL: This white porcelain dial displays Arabic numerals and Breguet hands. MOVT: This 21-jewel stem-set movement with lever escapement is nickel with a bridge style layout and is signed. C 3 (The case is in very good condition) D 3-50 (The dial is in very good condition, hairline(s) barely visible) M 3 (The movement is in very good condition) R 7 (Rarity on a scale of #1 being very common to #10 being extremely rare) Experts Opinion: An easy winding, extra clean open face with stark white porcelain dial. A gentleman’s watch that is easy to carry/enjoy and does have an 18K gold dust cover.
